Text:
For Christ sake, all that info and no mention of the director?! :)

It's by Jean-Pierre Jeunet, director of Delicatessen, Amelie from Montmartre, Alien Resurrection, among other good movies. Probably worth watching.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1149361/

This is a great flick!
If you liked "Delicatessen" and "The City of Lost Children" you'll love this.
Thank you
